tracing/production.title: Tracing in Production
tracing/production.description: Machine learning projects don't conclude with their initial launch. Ongoing monitoring and incremental enhancements are critical for long-term success. MLflow Tracing offers observability for your production application, supporting the iterative process of continuous improvement.

tracing/session.title: Tracing Multi-turn Conversation Sessions
tracing/session.description: In conversational AI applications, it is common that users interact with the model multiple times within a single conversation session. Since each interaction generates a trace in the typical MLflow setup, it is useful to group these traces together to analyze the conversation as a whole. You can achieve this by attaching the session ID as a tag to each trace.
